name: joshua graham
text: They always take so long to deliver. Said 15-20 min when i ordered. I get it almost an hour later. Pizza is always good tho.

name: Robert W
text: Pizza was good, done right, employees were friendly and did a great job.  I wish the owner or corporate would put some effort into remodeling/deep-cleaning the inside, so i feel better about eating pizza from a gas station.

name: Janna Venti
text: I rarely review fast food but I had to for this place. Every time I come pick it up, I would meet the same lady and she is so nice and friendly. It looks stressful in the kitchen but she‚Äôs always able to smile at the customers. My food is always ready very fast.

name: Imani Baker
text: I always ordered Pizza from this location! Until today, when i got yelled at by the delivery driver and then he drove off with my pizza in an angry manner! Definitely not gonna be ordering anything from here again! Totally unprofessional inconsiderate workers!!!

name: Virgo Queen78
text: Super fast delivery especially on a Saturday night!!! Pizza was hot, fresh ingredients & NOT greasy like most places!! One of the best pizzas I've had to date!!!

name: Mavis Gibson
text: Fresh and made to our liking, friendly and fast couldn't ask for more.

name: Logan Agle
text: Hard to find since it's in an odd location that can't be seen from the street, but an excellent and fast pizza location for when you really need one.

name: Benn Hill
text: Slow...Pizza dough is all premade and refrigerated...Toppings overcooked but dough still slightly under...They may be different if no rush is on but 5:30 pm before the Super Bowl was not their best showing.

text: Really Good pizza! Friendly Staff too :)

text: Wings good, but the pizza is gas station pizza not pizza hut. The only thing pizza hut about that pizza was the box.

text: Pizza was very under cooked and looked very sloppy in the box.   Also didn't have a very good taste to it. My first and last visit to this Pizza Hut.

name: Lewis Johnson
text: I'm changing my last review which was extremely negative and anger fueled.  Since my last order which I was extremely displeased with, I made another order and was a little surprised.  The pizza was great, delivered quick, and driver was friendly.  Looking forward to future business.

name: Angel Force
